properties.description: Detects when a failover plan is deleted from Veeam Backup & Replication. This might indicate unauthorized removal of critical components.
properties.name: Failover Plan Deleted
properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 26100
| extend FailoverPlanName =  extract("FailoverPlanName=\"(?<FailoverPlanName>[^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    UserName = user,
    ["Failover Plan Name"] = FailoverPlanName,
    MessageDetails = Description,
    Severity = SeverityDescription
